flunky

So this is it. The world's most pretentious book club.

Seriously

02 Nov 2010

Okay, meeting is on for this week. I’d claim come hell or high water, but until I get buy in from everyone via email I’m just not that confident. I just wanted to make sure the site was updated in case anyone is actually looking at this lately. (Seriously!)

We’re planning to meet at McMenamin’s Fireside Bar at 5:30pm on Thursday, November 4. There’s a new local ski flick debuting down the street at Summit at 7pm so we could make a night of it. We’ll cover the Introduction and Chapter 1.
— Matt Kern
